info.title: API-Basketball
info.description: Basketball data API providing comprehensive information about basketball leagues, teams, players, games, and more. This API covers basketball leagues from around the world with detailed season information, game data, and comprehensive coverage details.

get.description: Retrieve basketball leagues/cups based on various filters

parameters.name: team
parameters.description: Team ID to find leagues where the team has played

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search text for league name or country

get.description: Retrieve basketball games based on various filters
Retrieve basketball teams based on various filters
Retrieve basketball players based on various filters
Retrieve available stages for league standings
Retrieve available groups for league standings
Retrieve team statistics from one or several games
Retrieve player statistics from one or several games
Retrieve betting odds from games or leagues
Retrieve the list of available timezones
Retrieve the list of available countries
